attributes.action: The dismissal of Jeremy Hunt for publishing patient identifiable data on Twitter
attributes.background:
Jeremy Hunt posted a picture of himself on Twitter with patient identifiable data in the background and therefore breaching patient confidentiality.

This is a dismissable offence for any NHS staff, and as such, should extend to the Health Secretary.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104660


You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
